actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Baker for Senator McClure with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 97-555.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 817.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to quiet title and possession with respect to a certain private land claim in Livingston Parish, Louisiana.

summary.text: Grants a fee simple in specified land to a named individual.

titles.title: A bill to quiet title and possession with respect to a certain private land claim in Livingston Parish, Louisiana.
